dublin_core.dcvalue: Marc Mitchell, President, D-tree International, Email: mmitchel@hsph.harvard.edu

The Safer Deliveries program integrates novel mHealth approaches -- decision support, data storage, mobile banking, and communications -- into a community intervention that effectively links the institutional and community levels to overcome barriers to hospital deliveries in Zanzibar.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:19Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 mhealth_for_safer_deliveries.pdf: 213236 bytes, checksum: 053f528dde7f537e824808e8cba2ea7b (MD5)
Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, Financial transactions and incentives, Registries and vital events tracking, Maternal health, Newborn health
